title: Autism and Vaccines - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/21/18
itunes:title: Autism and Vaccines - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/21/18
description:
George Noory and autism activist Kent Heckenlively discuss his family's struggle with his daughter's autism, and what parents can do if they do not want to get their children vaccinated.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
